page.title: 16Social Concerns-Gleadless
page.content: One major concern is the future of education.Frecheville comprehensive school is due to be amalgamated with Thornbridge comprehensive school.There is also a threat to close Frecheville Infant and Basegreen Junior schools. Another concern was the need for safe places for children to play. The area would benefit from a sports club,more job centres and pension clubs. There was a general comment for even more foot patrols by the police. Fear of burglaries-amongst old people was of particular concern. Anxiety about the volume of traffic on the main roads,not only due to the increased incidence of accidents but also in terms of pollution. One 17 year old girl said that she was concerned that the City Council would be hindered in maintaining services because of pressure from Central Govt.
